comment.author: 54000959@N06
comment._content: According to the Brooklyn Historical Society this may be Lafayette Avenue, near Franklin Street. Their caption reads: Lafayette Avenue, near Franklin. V1974.40.1.28, from an album of photographs of the Blizzard of 1888 taken by the Brooklyn Academy of Photography, from the Photography Collection at the Brooklyn Historical Society. And the print has a handwritten caption on the front. See a copy of it here: brooklynhistory.org/blog/2010/02/10/oh-the-weather-outsid...

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On February 09, 2013, Herb Lubalin Study Center suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
